description: To mitigate the issue associated with CVE-2023-5474, it is essential to update Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) to version 118.0.2088.46. This version addresses a heap buffer overflow in the PDF renderer, a vulnerability initially reported in the Chromium project. Users can easily check their current version by clicking on the three dots in the upper right corner of the Edge browser, selecting 'Help and feedback', and then 'About Microsoft Edge'. It is strongly recommended to apply this update to ensure the browser no longer remains vulnerable. For more information and to verify the update package, visit [Microsoft Security Response Center](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2023-5474).
